title: Value & Growth Demagogues - Ep 110
itunes:title: Value & Growth Demagogues - Ep 110
description:
Vitaliy has a problem with both value- and growth investing demagogues. While value demagogues tend to believe any company that trades at a P/E above the market average is too frothy, growth demagogues claim that price doesn't matter.

In this podcast, Vitaliy explains how both camps can be too narrow minded, and how investors should learn from the best of both sides when selecting companies to buy.

You can read this article online here: https://contrarianedge.com/value-growth-demagogues/
